thread.title: Re: The ‘It’s time for some game theory’ guy compared Stephen Miller to Joseph Goebbels
thread.title_full: Re: The ‘It’s time for some game theory’ guy compared Stephen Miller to Joseph Goebbels

author: GonetoCarolina
title: Re: The ‘It’s time for some game theory’ guy compared Stephen Miller to Joseph Goebbels
text:
The ‘It’s time for some game theory’ guy compared Stephen Miller to Joseph Goebbels Posted at 6:41 pm   Greg P.   
Remember Eric Garland? He was the author of the much-mocked tweetstorm that started off with, “ It’s time for some game theory .” Anyway, here’s what he tweeted on Saturday: I'm not saying that Stephen Miller bears an eerie resemblance to Reich Minister of Propaganda Joseph Goebbels except oops OK here you go. pic.twitter.com/0Uo10M7XRO 
— Eric Garland (@ericgarland) February 12, 2017 
“Demented” nails it: why for all my criticism of @realDonaldTrump i can NEVER be a NEVER TRUMP the left's disdain for him and his people is simply demented https://t.co/aw6Rv0C8v9 
— Charles Gasparino (@CGasparino)   
And keep in mind that Stephen Miller is Jewish: Others may disagree, but I'm very much not down with comparing Jewish people to Nazis. Even ones as odious and dangerous as Miller. https://t.co/kUf7aaKD4Y 
— Paul Allor (@PaulAllor) February 12, 2017 I guess this is intended to be clever. All it does is cheapen the debate https://t.co/OE4TfbYZgA 
— Stephen Pollard (@stephenpollard) February 12, 2017 
Time for an apology. 
Is this going to be a thing now? New York magazine art critic Jerry Saltz made the comparison, too: Pick one: Far right-wing Trump Advisor Stephen Miller looks like: A.) Roy Cohen B.) Pee Wee Herman C. Joseph Goebbels ?? @SNLUpdate pic.twitter.com/GzQdDKdWZx 
— Jerry Saltz (@jerrysaltz) February 12, 2017 
They’re unhinged.
